text: When the sailing season was past, he sent Pearl back to England, and returned to Rome for the winter. In late November, he was 'suffering as usual', but hoped, he told Arthur, find this place agree with me better than Naples. The journey has been against me, as there has been much rain and damp, but the temperature is high & I have not thought of a fire.
